    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(java.time.LocalDate holidayDate)
      CREATE a new holiday and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new holiday object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, holiday object will be written to a new file and saved
      void delete(java.time.LocalDate valueToSearch)
      Delete a Holiday in the Database file, based on the date attribute passed
      boolean isHoliday(java.time.LocalDate valueToSearch)
      Check if a date is an holiday by checking against every records in the Database file
      java.util.ArrayList<Holiday> read()
      READ and return every Cineplex in the Database file If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
      void replaceExistingFile(java.lang.String filename, java.util.ArrayList<Holiday> data)
      Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Admin

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(java.time.LocalDate holidayDate)
        CREATE a new holiday and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new holiday object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, holiday object will be written to a new file and saved
        Parameters:
        holidayDate - Date of this Holiday

      • read

        public java.util.ArrayList<Holiday> read()
        READ and return every Cineplex in the Database file If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
        Returns:
        Model.Holiday Return list of Holidays if any, else empty list

      • delete

        public void delete(java.time.LocalDate valueToSearch)
        Delete a Holiday in the Database file, based on the date attribute passed
        Parameters:
        valueToSearch - Date of Holiday to be deleted

      • isHoliday

        public boolean isHoliday(java.time.LocalDate valueToSearch)
        Check if a date is an holiday by checking against every records in the Database file
        Parameters:
        valueToSearch - Date of Holiday to be check
        Returns:
        boolean Return true if Date passed in is a holiday, else false

      • replaceExistingFile

        public void replaceExistingFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Holiday> data)
        Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Admin
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to check for
        data - New ArrayList of Holiday to be written to the file
